about_the_game:
Get your mech suit ready and blast through the bots on your way to uncover why a new wave of destruction is sweeping the city! Power Chips is a love letter to classic 2D 16-bit platforming and shooter games that’s fun for the whole family. 

One of the many features in Power Chips is the crisp movement, specifically dashing, which gives players a burst of forward momentum. This not only speeds up movement but also opens up new platforming possibilities and combat strategies, allowing for quicker evasion and better control when lining up attacks. Additionally, wall jumping lets the player cling to and scale vertical surfaces, adding depth to platforming and enabling players to scale walls to avoid attacks.

You can attack the main bosses in any order. After each boss is vanquished a new a weapon will be gained, some bosses are weaker to another bosses weapon so plan your route wisely!
